mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescription (medicament_id, client_id, doctor_id, amount_of_medicine, diagnosis, signature, seal) VALUES ( (SELECT medicament_id FROM medicament WHERE medicament_id = #{medicament.id}), (SELECT client_id FROM client WHERE client_id = #{client.id}), (SELECT doctor_id FROM doctor WHERE doctor_id = #{doctor.id}), #{amount_of_medicine}, #{diagnosis}, #{signature}, #{seal})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.*, c.*, d.* FROM prescription p JOIN medicament m ON p.medicament_id = m.medicament_id JOIN client c ON p.client_id = c.client_id JOIN doctor d ON p.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE p.prescription_id = #{id}
